transArray.content:
Facilities: The newly opened facilities of the hotel are very new, the faucets and showers are very clean, and the smart Xiaodu can hold conversations and play music, which is very technological.
Hygiene: The sanitation is also very clean, the sheets are clean, the quilts are clean, and the rooms are disinfected, so you can feel at ease! !
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
